title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 169.1 - Scope of part
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 169.1 - Scope of part

State Regulations

The purpose of this Part is to establish standards for the
use of such funds as may be made available by the Legislature to support
training programs for New York State business and industry for the purpose of
maintaining and expanding the economic base of the State. The provisions of
this Part shall be applicable only for those years in which money is
appropriated by the Legislature for the employer specific training grant
program. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
169.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
